summary: Archaeologists in Egypt find one of their crew has been turned into a blood sucking mummy after they have unleashed a three thousand year curse by entering a Pharaoh's tomb.
cast: Mark Dana|Ziva Rodann|Diane Brewster|George N. Neise|Alvaro Guillot|Ben Wright|Guy Prescott|Terence de Marney|Richard Peel|Kurt Katch|Robert Fortin|Ralph Clanton
title: Pharaoh's Curse
